author: Hamburgers
title: Comment on C.J. Conrad sporting boot on his right foot by Hamburgers
text:
Article written by Courtney Hessler Ashley Judd is my spirit animal. Follow me on twitter at: @Hessler_KSR 5 responses to “C.J. Conrad sporting boot on his right foot” Dale October 17, 2015 at 11:08 am | Permalink | Reply 
Not noteworthy at all if you knew just how many players wear boots and casts in the days following games. non-story… Courtney Hessler October 17, 2015 at 11:11 am | Permalink 
This comment isn’t noteworthy. ruscat October 17, 2015 at 11:35 am | Permalink | Reply 
Well, thanks Courtney. I appreciate it even if someone else feels it’s not noteworthy. UGH… Where’s the love fo real TheDon October 17, 2015 at 11:57 am | Permalink | Reply 
Good scoop October 17, 2015 at 2:44   
His brother looks identical to him. Woah. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
